law.catch_line: A person, including a licensed physician, who violates or conspires to violate any provision of this...
law.text: A person, including a licensed physician, who violates or conspires to violate any provision of this subtitle that relates to trader's licenses for visually handicapped individuals or Blind Industries is guilty of a misdemeanor and, on conviction, is subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 6 months or both.
